section.name: Description
section.p: The <javaNetDelete> task elets a file to the file sharing section of java.net. Just like the delete task, The task will not cause the build to fail even if the specified file is not present.

tr.td: The name of the project to which a file is uploaded. (e.g., "javanettasks")
The account name. Deleting a file requires an account with a proper permission. (e.g., "kohsuke")
The full path name of the file to be deleted. It uses a Unix-like path name (e.g., "/folder1/subFolder/target.zip").
